channel.title: [317-Delta]Donor, Ranks
channel.description:
I have a couple questions... 317 Delta!
So I just made my servers donor zone & was wondering:
1) How can I make a monster donor only (So only donors can access) & what file is it in? 2) How can I make a shop donor only (So only donor can access0 & what file is it in? 3) How can I make a new class of donor (Like I have donor, how can I make say, Gold Donor) & what file is it in? (So like Donor = 0 is no donor, Donor = 1 is Donor, Donor = 2 is plat donor or something?)
Thank you!!

item.title: [317-Delta]Donor, Ranks
item.dc:creator: @SGTCannon SGTCannon
item.description:
@SGTCannon wrote:

[quote=“gravenfire23, post:2, topic:384250”][quote author=SGTCannon link=topic=480012.msg3514077#msg3514077 date=1298820797]
I have a couple questions…
317 Delta!

So I just made my servers donor zone & was wondering:

  1. How can I make a monster donor only (So only donors can access) & what file is it in?
  2. How can I make a shop donor only (So only donor can access0 & what file is it in?
  3. How can I make a new class of donor (Like I have donor, how can I make say, Gold Donor) & what file is it in? (So like Donor = 0 is no donor, Donor = 1 is Donor, Donor = 2 is plat donor or something?)

Thank you!!
[/quote]

I have a couple questions…
317 Delta!

So I just made my servers donor zone & was wondering:

  1. How can I make a monster donor only (So only donors can access) & what file is it in?
  2. How can I make a shop donor only (So only donor can access0 & what file is it in?
  3. How can I make a new class of donor (Like I have donor, how can I make say, Gold Donor) & what file is it in? (So like Donor = 0 is no donor, Donor = 1 is Donor, Donor = 2 is plat donor or something?)

Thank you!!

  1. Maybe you only spawn the monster in a place where non-donators can come.
  2. In client.java you will find something like npcid == ####
    wanneshop = ## add after npcid == #### && donator == 1
  3. Well you can say donor = 3 & let it be a gold donator.
  1. It is, but I don’t want non-donors getting the currency
  2. Okay, thanks.
  3. But I mean, do I need to create a new class?
    Have you even attempted any of these things because no one here is going to spoon feed you.[/quote]

I already made the regular donor class, tried to make new donor class and It didnt work

Read full topic

item.title: [317-Delta]Donor, Ranks
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“SGTCannon, post:1, topic:384250”]I have a couple questions…
317 Delta!

So I just made my servers donor zone & was wondering:

  1. How can I make a monster donor only (So only donors can access) & what file is it in?
  2. How can I make a shop donor only (So only donor can access0 & what file is it in?
  3. How can I make a new class of donor (Like I have donor, how can I make say, Gold Donor) & what file is it in? (So like Donor = 0 is no donor, Donor = 1 is Donor, Donor = 2 is plat donor or something?)

Thank you!![/quote]

  1. Maybe you only spawn the monster in a place where non-donators can come.
  2. In client.java you will find something like npcid == ####
    wanneshop = ## add after npcid == #### && donator == 1
  3. Well you can say donor = 3 & let it be a gold donator.

Read full topic
